title: You'll love where you live! Come home to Walden Brook
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Walden Brook!', 'Address:', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Beds:', '2  /', 'Baths:', '2 /', 'Size:', '1157 - 1252 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1753', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park.", 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '● BBQ/Picnic Area', '● Clubhouse', '● Conference Room', '● Courtyard', '● Gameroom', '● Gated entry', '● Maintenance on site', '● Multi Use Room', '● Playground', '● Sprinkler System', '● Car Care Center', '● Controlled Access', '● Detached garages', '● Lake view', '● Online Services', '● Package Service', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Sundeck', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● All electric', '● Carpet', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Extra Storage', '● Handrails', '● Pantry', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Range', '● Window Coverings', '● Broadband access', '● Built in computer niches', '● Contemporary floor plans', '● Crown Molding', '● Fully equipped modern kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● Large walk-in closets', '● Recreation Room', '● Storage Space', '● Walk-In Closets', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B40AB7ED0D1B4A']
